alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 11:22AM MDT until June 08 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Piute, Iron, Kane, Garfield and Sevier Counties. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt high mountain snowpack and maintain high river flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Continued minor flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...From this morning to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet (1040 CFS), minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 3.6 feet (920 CFS). - Forecast...The river will oscillate below flood stage, but above action stage, with a maximum value of 3.8 feet (960 CFS) early Tuesday morning. - Action stage is 3.5 feet (879 CFS). - Flood stage is 3.9 feet (1040 CFS). &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued early Monday afternoon at 12 PM MDT.
